EmailTemplate.name: 10/04/2014 Paid Sports Clubs Term 3
EmailTemplate.subject: Paid Sports Clubs Term 3
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
British International School Kuala Lumpur Chartered By The British Schools Foundation
Dear {!Contact.Salutation} {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
Please find below links to Paid Sports Clubs for Term 3 which are ran by our specialist PE teachers and coaches. Places are likely to go quickly so please be sure to register promptly. Separate registration forms are in the linked documents:
Athletics and Fitness (https://drive.google.com/a/britishschools.co.uk/file/d/0B57vMviVDx-xZXd5ZFVrNWdfTjQ/edit?usp=sharing)
Badminton (https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B57vMviVDx-xQjFUNC1XRE51RUU/edit?usp=sharing)
Basketball (https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B57vMviVDx-xM2g0RnFaWUp2SWM/edit?usp=sharing)
Rugby (https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B57vMviVDx-xY3pxck0xNFlITkZkQUVGRC1XU1ozREpkakhr/edit?usp=sharing)
Saturday Football Development (https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B57vMviVDx-xR1Bib2I4cU52RmZTenFnTWZWMGZ6RzNqTi1R/edit?usp=sharing)
Trampolining (https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B57vMviVDx-xdnAxY01vOE9vc1E/edit?usp=sharing)
Kind regards
Admin Team British International School Kuala Lumpur World Class Education
_________________________________________________________ Kuala Lumpur - Sao Paulo - Manila - Moscow - Nanjing - Tashkent - Pamplona - Marbella
